div.h1: All LPS Schools remain closed until May 4.

div.style: border-left: 3px solid black; border-right: 3px solid black; border-bottom: 3px solid black;

h1.strong: Message to LPS families from Superintendent Paris.

p.strong: The information detailed in this websiteis intended to provide guidance and resources for this period. It is important to note that this is a fluid situation and this document will be regularly updated. It is recommended that you revisit frequently for the latest updates and information.
All changes as of April 17 are highlighted in YELLOW.

hr.p: The Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary Education has provided new Guidance for Families about Remote Learning English (Spanish)and other education related updates.Updated Guidance provided by the Department of Elementary and Secondary Education is reflected in a newLPS letter aboutSpecial Education(Spanish) and theLPS Special Education Remote Learning Plan(Spanish)
For families of English Learners (ELs), please read the LPS Letter to Families of ELs (Spanish) and reach out with any questions.
